channel.title: last on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in last on Barefoot Rob

item.title: last Akihabara lesson this year
item.description: 20:22 Thursday 20 December 2018 JST We had our last lesson of the year in Akihabara today. This is also Toshie’s last lesson so we had a party in her honor with all her favorite snack foods.

item.title: last full day in Brazil in 2017
item.description: 14:24 Friday 29 December 2017 -02 Actually, tomorrow is our last full day, but some of it will be spent flying to Sao Paulo. Our flight to Dubai leaves at 1am Sunday morning. We just finished lunch after Dom and Rose taught me and Jorge(sp) to play rummy. I had never played before. 14:50 The pool has just been vacuumed and now it’s time to swim!

item.title: leaving Fortaleza soon
item.description: 06:17 Sunday 24 December 2017 -03 Leaving Fortaleza today (and my glasses, unless I happen to find them on last scan of the beach) 06:58 Sunday 24 December 2017 -03 Didn’t find my glasses during a quick walk along the beach near where I lost them. We did find breakfast buffet quite lovely, and I can make do with Lin’s glasses. Headed to the airport now to fly to Presidente Prudente via Sao Paulo (to see our friends R&D).

item.title: in Akihabara for last lesson of 2017
item.description: 17:54 Thursday 14 December 2017 JST After working 3 hours (5 lessons) near Lazona, I’m eating cold lunch in Akihabara across the street from GG lesson. I have Lin’s sister’s heavy-as-hell suitcase. (Now I know why gorillas cannot break them) 19:41 Lesson was great; everyone was there! Yoko, Maki, and Atusko all brought sweets! Mayumi and Toshie both did homework!

item.title: Shane died
item.description: 06:12 Monday 20 November 2017 JST Just found out that Charlie died yesterday. Don’t have details (intentional / accidental). I called Dad, but immediately went to voice mail. I guess he is talking to them already. 20:55 Wednesday 29 November 2017 JST I misunderstood. It was Shane, not Charlie.

item.title: mt3 started last track
item.description: 22:57 Tuesday 07 November 2017 JST I have spent 3.8+ days on MT3 so far.

item.title: last(?) lunch with Esther
item.description: 15:47 Thursday 27 July 2017 JST I ate lunch with Esther in Ueno station before she moves to Okinawa. It sounds like she’s found a good job down there; I hope it works out well!

item.title: last day at HN school
item.description: 11:56 Wednesday 15 July 2015 JST Good last lesson at HN today; we talked about universities in the US, practiced ordering food in a fast food restaurant, then asked random questions the rest of the time. TIL (Today I Learned) Tokyo Tower is taller than Eiffel Tower Tokyo Tower is 333 meters tall (inc. antenna) Eiffel Tower is 301 meters tall Tokyo Sky Tree is 495 meters tall Shinnogawa in Nagano is the longest river in Japan Volleyball nets are 140cm tall.
